basic_info.description: Hatice Kirac Rolle: UX Designer Praksis: Moment Analyse Ferdigheter: Figma, UX, UI, HTML, CSS, C#, React Native, .NET, Docker, Python, MariaDB, MySQL Mitt navn er Hatice, og jeg kommer fra Tyrkia. Som IT-student har jeg opparbeidet meg verdifull erfaring og innsikt innen flere områder av informatikk.Jeg har særlig interesse for både frontend- og backendutvikling, samt sikkerhet som et viktig og spennende felt innen programvareutvikling. Gjennom studiet har jeg opparbeidet solid erfaring med samarbeid i grupper, og jeg trives godt med å arbeide sammen med andre for å finne gode løsninger. Jeg er motivert av nye utfordringer og ser alltid etter muligheter for både personlig og faglig utvikling. For tiden deltar jeg i utviklingen av en egen app sammen med en medstudent, noe som gir meg praktisk erfaring og dypere forståelse av utviklingsprosesser. På fritiden liker jeg å bruke tid på strikking, pilates og sosiale aktiviteter med venner og familie.

additional_info.description: Hatice Kirac Role: UX Designer Internship: Moment Analyse Skills: Figma, UX, UI, HTML, CSS, C#, React Native, .NET, Docker, Python, MariaDB, MySQL My name is Hatice, and I come from Turkey. As an IT student, I have gained valuable experience and insight in various areas of computer science. I have a particular interest in both frontend and backend development, as well as security, which I find to be an important and exciting field in software development. Throughout my studies, I have built solid experience working in teams, and I thrive when collaborating with others to find good solutions. I am motivated by new challenges and always look for opportunities for both personal and professional development. Currently, I am participating in developing my own app together with a fellow student, which gives me practical experience and deeper understanding of development processes. In my free time, I enjoy knitting, pilates, and social activities with friends and family.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
